sent.orig: Each year Universum, an employer-branding consultant, asks some 30,000 American students to name their ideal employer.
sent.trans: 一家雇主形象咨询机构，每年都向大约30000名美国大学生询问他们心中理想的雇主。

sent.orig: If you submit your resume on an employer's Web site, only that employer will see it.
sent.trans: 如果你只向一个雇主的网站投递简历，那么只有这个雇主会看到它。

sent.orig: Defined as Relevant Income unless otherwise specified in my Employer's Employer Voluntary Contribution Application Form.
sent.trans: 薪金定义除在雇主的雇主自愿性供款申请表格中所界定之外，薪金定义为本人之有关入息。

sent.orig: Introduce each employer with a line that describes your most impressive achievements at that employer.
sent.trans: 在介绍每个雇主的时候用一行文字来描述你最引人注意的成就。

sent.orig: Lancashire Enterprise plc is an equal opportunity employer.
sent.trans: 兰克郡实业有限公司对一切应聘者一视同仁。
